snippet.title: DC Heroes United - Play Now!
snippet.description:
🔥Get ready! DC Heroes United is live!

DC Heroes United is a new interactive streaming series and mobile game debuting later this year, licensed by Warner Bros. Interactive Entertainment on behalf of DC.

Watch the story unfold live each week on Tubi. Play as a Super Hero and Decide Earth-212’s future!

DC Heroes United features an all-new storyline with weekly decisions that audiences will make to impact the future of Batman, Superman, Wonder Woman and more. The story sets the Justice League at year zero, meaning fans will have an opportunity to shake up the team from the very beginning. How the Justice League forms, the relationships between the characters – and in some cases, who survives – is all up to the audience.

This engaging title integrates gaming and interactive storytelling in ways never before seen in entertainment.

The app is live now on the App Store and Google Play: https://click.dcheroesunited.com/1Zvt/prereg

#Batman #Superman #Wonderwoman 

Check the latest info at https://dcheroesunited.com/
Follow us:
X (Twitter):   / https://x.com/GenvidEnt
Instagram:   / https://www.instagram.com/genvidentertainment/
Facebook:   / https://www.facebook.com/GenvidEntertainment
Linkedin:   / https://www.linkedin.com/company/genvid-technologies-inc
